Full name.description: The full name of the owner or institution

Acronym.description: The acronym or short name for the owner or institution

Owner - Institution ID.description: Internal database ID for the owner or institution

External PID.description: Optional external PID such as ORCID for people or ROR for institutions

Country.description: The country where the owner or institution is located

Web page address.description: The webpage address for the owner or institution

Further owner/institution details.description: Additional information about the owner or institution
